COPYRIGHTS:


My Money Manager 1.0 
Copyright (c) 2018 MDH


*** END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ***


IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE.


1. LICENSE


By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using My Money Manager 1.0 containing this software, you agree that this End User User License Agreement(EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. Unless you have a different license agreement signed by MDH your use of My Money Manager 1.0 indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty. Subject to the terms of this Agreement, MDH grants to you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use My Money Manager 1.0 in accordance with this Agreement and any other written agreement with MDH. MDH does not transfer the title of My Money Manager 1.0 to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a binding legal agreement between MDH and the purchasers or users of My Money Manager 1.0. If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove My Money Manager 1.0 from your computer now and, if applicable, promptly return to MDH by mail any copies of My Money Manager 1.0 and related documentation and packaging in your possession.


2. DISTRIBUTION


My Money Manager 1.0 and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold, offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may make one copy for archive purposes only. For information about redistribution of My Money Manager 1.0 contact MDH.


3. USER AGREEMENT


3.1 Use


Your license to use My Money Manager 1.0 is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of My Money Manager 1.0.


3.2 Use Restrictions


You shall use My Money Manager 1.0 in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful purpose. Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of My Money Manager 1.0 together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited. Each licensed copy of My Money Manager 1.0 may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of My Money Manager 1.0 means that you have loaded, installed, or run My Money Manager 1.0 on a computer or similar device. If you install My Money Manager 1.0 onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of My Money Manager 1.0 must be licensed separately. You may make one copy of My Money Manager 1.0 for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of My Money Manager 1.0 . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of My Money Manager 1.0 are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of MDH. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of My Money Manager 1.0. If any person other than yourself uses My Money Manager 1.0 registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!


3.3 Copyright Restriction


This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile My Money Manager 1.0. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from My Money Manager 1.0 in whole or in part. MDH name, logo and graphics file that represents My Money Manager 1.0 shall not be used in any way to promote products developed with My Money Manager 1.0 . MDH retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to My Money Manager 1.0 and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto. Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of My Money Manager 1.0, products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for MDH.


3.4 Limitation of Responsibility


You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend MDH , its employees, agents and distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or in any way connected with your use of MDH Software. In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will MDH , its employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, My Money Manager 1.0 or the use or inability to use My Money Manager 1.0 or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence. MDH entire liability, without exception, is limited to the customers reimbursement of the purchase price of the Software (maximum being the lesser of the amount paid by you and the suggested retail price as listed by MDH ) in exchange for the return of the product, all copies, registration papers and manuals, and all materials that constitute a transfer of license from the customer back to MDH.


3.5 Warranties


Except as expressly stated in writing, MDH makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.


3.6 Governing Law


This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the Malaysia applicable therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.


3.7 Termination


Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of My Money Manager 1.0 and destroy all copies of My Money Manager 1.0 supplied under this Agreement. The financial obligations incurred by you shall survive the expiration or termination of this license.


4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY


THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD AS IS AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY My Money Manager 1.0 AS WELL.


5. CONSENT OF USE OF DATA


You agree that MDH may collect and use information gathered in any manner as part of the product support services provided to you, if any, related to My Money Manager 1.0.MDH may also use this information to provide notices to you which may be of use or interest to you.
